com.microsoft.bingads.bulk
Class BulkServiceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.microsoft.bingads.bulk.BulkServiceManager

public class BulkServiceManager
extends Object

Provides high level methods for uploading and downloading entities using the Bulk API functionality. Also provides methods for submitting upload or download operations. Example: BulkServiceManager#downloadFile(DownloadParameters) will submit the download request to the bulk service, poll until the status is completed (or returns an error), and downloads the file locally. If instead you want to manage the low level details you would first call {@link BulkServiceManager#submitDownload(DownloadParameters)}, wait for the results file to be prepared using either {@link BulkOperation#getStatus()} or {@link BulkOperation#track(Progress)}, and then download the file with the {@link BulkOperation#downloadResultFile(String, String, boolean)} method.

submitDownloadAsync

public Future<BulkDownloadOperation> submitDownloadAsync(SubmitDownloadParameters parameters,
                                                         AsyncCallback<BulkDownloadOperation> callback)
Submits a download request to the Bing Ads bulk service with the specified parameters. The DownloadParameters.getResultFileDirectory() and DownloadParameters.getResultFileName() properties are ignored by this method. When the file is ready for download, specify the result file path and name as parameters of the BulkOperation#downloadResultFile(String, String, boolean) method.

Parameters:
parameters - Describes the type of entities and data scope that you want to download.
callback -
Returns:

submitUploadAsync

public Future<BulkUploadOperation> submitUploadAsync(FileUploadParameters parameters,
                                                     AsyncCallback<BulkUploadOperation> callback)
Submits an upload request to the Bing Ads bulk service with the specified parameters. The UploadParameters#getResultFileDirectory() and UploadParameters#getResultFileName() properties are ignored by this method. When the file is ready for download, specify the result file path and name as parameters of the BulkOperation#downloadResultFile(String, String, boolean) method.

Parameters:
parameters - Describes the upload response mode and file name.
callback -
Returns:
